================================== FAILURES ===================================
 testFailures[\nclass TestFoo:\n    def method(self):\n        print('the cursor')\n]

code = "\nclass TestFoo:\n    def method(self):\n        print('the cursor')\n"

    @pytest.mark.parametrize('code', [
        """
    class TestFoo:
        def method(self):
            print('the cursor')
    """
    ])
    def testFailures(code):
>       assert get_test_under_cursor(code) is None
E       assert 'TestFoo::method' is None
E        +  where 'TestFoo::method' = get_test_under_cursor("\nclass TestFoo:\n    def method(self):\n        print('the cursor')\n")

code       = "\nclass TestFoo:\n    def method(self):\n        print('the cursor')\n"
